name: sweetbriar
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an old type of rose with simple pink flowers, many thorns (= small, sharp points) on the stems, and a sweet smell like apples: I'm extremely fond of the native sweetbriar (Rosa rubiginosa). Ten years ago this land had nothing on it but sweet briar and thyme. The sweetbriers form wonderful hedges, but they only flower once. Their room was small but sweet briers and honeysuckles peeped into the windows.
More examplesFewer examplesThis sweet briar rose is valued for the strong apple aroma which comes from the leaves.
